website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to go wrong with this shaker, especially at such an affordable price. However, it can really only make one drink at a time.
pros: Ideal for anyone who wants precise temperature control, as the sturdy double-wall construction keeps liquid at an optimal temperature
cons: Shaker holds enough liquid for just one drink (or perhaps two smaller ones)
Not optimal for larger gatherings or parties

customer_reviews.title: I am honestly completely at a loss over this OXO ...
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly completely at a loss over this OXO product. The cap doesn't seal to the rim of the shaker, so as you're shaking your cocktail, the cap is filling up with the contents of the shaker. And there's absolutely no mechanism for the "slosh" to return to the shaker once you're ready to uncap and pour. You just end up with a huge mess on your hands, shaker and work surface. I returned it and I hope mine was somehow defective and missing a critical part that would seal the cap and shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical.
customer_reviews.text: Something about metal shakers freak me out, it has to do with the taste, and the alcohol, I just don't particularly like them. Because of that I have purchased numerous plastic shakers, all of which have leaked, cracked or some combination of both.This shaker is very well constructed, as some other reviewers have said, it does resemble the making of a thermos or travel coffee cup, however I see that as a plus. The jigger has measurements and the outside is very soft to hold. The Jigger also has some sort of rubber which is nice because it doesn't flip over when you're pouring into it. OXO always has good products but this really a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good for klutzy people
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who's just starting out in the home-cocktailing world. Yes, it looks cheap, but surprisingly it has just as good a seal as its metal counterpart and the same double-walled construction.This is a great product if you need something for a friend who will be making drinks while a few under and might drop it on their foot or who would otherwise freeze their hands with a conventional shaker. It's a cost-effective investment for them to see if they even end up using it much too. Highly recommend this as a My First Cocktail Shaker. You can always move on and up when you're ready to.
customer_reviews.author: johnjohn

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: When shopping around for a cocktail shaker all I could find were the metal ones and then I came across this one on Amazon. I like OXO products, and after reading the reviews thought this would be the shaker for me. I was right, I really like it. It doesn't get slippery like the metal ones and does not condensate. Some of the reviews I read said the lid was hard to get off, but mine is not. I have used it several times and it works great. I make sure to hand wash it as well. I like it a lot and am glad I chose to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: shake it, baby!
customer_reviews.text: I find it easy to use (open and close). It has not leaked on me in more than a dozen uses. The strainer in the cap is very handy. The only potential con is that you don't feel the temperature of the drink inside (which is why I bought an insulated plastic shaker to begin with!). But if bartender 101 says to leave the drink in the shaker until you see the sweat bead up on the shaker, you don't get that feedback here.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbow

customer_reviews.title: Great little Shaker
customer_reviews.text: So, it's probably a little odd, but I make iced coffee in this 'cocktail shaker'. I put ice, instant coffee and creamer in, then boiling water and mix it up. No leaks, mixes perfectly with ice and boiling hot water for my coffee. Hasn't deteriorated after a year of use and I get my drink. Job done. I'd buy it again and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the lid off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my steel shaker was very difficult to open once the drink was made, making it very difficult to make another. This OXO came today and I was so excited to have a shaker that I could easily take the lid off of. Well, right out of the box it took my husband and me several tries to get the lid off, and that is with nothing in it. I am not sure if it is worth returning it because it is only a $10 item and shipping would cost me half that.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Watson

customer_reviews.title: Gread Cocktail Shaker for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for an extra coctail shaker, have a glass one now and did not want to spend a lot for another one in glass or metal. For the price this is a great item. Seals tight, light weight, and easy to open. You can't go wrong with this one. Would like to see them make a larger one maybe 24 oz, but this holds 16 oz. which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gonnerman

customer_reviews.title: Good Cocktail Shaker
customer_reviews.text: For home use, this cocktail shaker is perfectly fine. The pieces fit together very nicely and don't leak when you shake your drinks. The cup is insulated, so your hand does not freeze when you're shaking your drinks. It's made of plastic and seems to be pretty durable and it's easy to wash. The cap also doubles as a measuring cup. The only problem I have had with it is the markings on the inside of my cap rubbed off after a few washes, but I typically use my jigger when I am measuring so no big loss.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Small

customer_reviews.title: Meh, probably worth a few more dollars for a nice one
customer_reviews.text: I love most of OXO products. This for me was just ok. The price sold me, and it looks nice. And at first glance, it does look nice. But functionally, it's definitely nothing exciting to use. I've had some problems getting the top back on it quickly. Often find myself using plastic cups to mix drinks in, and really wouldn't buy this again. Taking up space in my kitchen, and I wish I would of splurged on a nicer quality shaker.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stefanko

customer_reviews.title: what can be expected of a plastic cocktail shaker
customer_reviews.text: My first OXO product, this has impressed me. I like the grips, ease of use, and price. I've thrown this thing a few times for various odd reasons and haven't had it break yet so it's pretty tough, though it is plastic so it will surely break eventually. It can be slightly difficult to open but not anything to complain about, that just means the top wont pop off while you shake up a drink. Works great for the occasional cocktail night.
customer_reviews.author: Jsen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go-to shaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband does most of the mixing in our house but when I do get the chance at making a cocktail, I always grab this one. It is lightweight and seals up better than any of the other metal ones. Plus, it is insulated so your hands don't get cold when you are shaking something up. My only complaint is that I've dropped it a few times and it has cracked the plastic outside shell. The shaker still works but I decided to buy a new one anyway. The price point is certainly not a hindrance to that anyway!
customer_reviews.author: April MacFarlan

customer_reviews.title: Great but not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at a bar and had to have one for myself. I like this shaker a lot but the fact that it is not dishwasher safe makes it a little more of a pain to use. I have put it in the dishwasher a few times and it seems that the lid is now more difficult to put on and remove. Nevertheless, it still works great and is a good value. 5 stars if it were dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: newbie

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheap and hard to open/close
customer_reviews.text: This was super cheap but I'm liking it a lot. It's quiet compared to the metal shaker I had before and I like the dark look. The top is kind of hard to press on when getting ready to shake and when you get it on, it goes on tight. That said, you've got to sort of rock the top back and forth to loosen unless you want it to fly off from too much force and watch your drink fly across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Majerus

customer_reviews.title: Best shaker
customer_reviews.text: I HATE metal shakers because they're impossible to open. This one is perfect. The only downside is that I'm drinking more cocktails than I should...
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: No more freezing hands!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shaker for the sole purpose of avoiding the icy chill of my metal shaker. This is a great shaker that doesn't leak and even has measurement marks on the lid if you don't have a jigger handy. The only complaint I have that knocked it down a star is that the holes in the strainer are bigger than I'd like, allowing bits of ice to get in my drink. That's still not enough to keep me from using it.
customer_reviews.author: C & J McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy-to-use shaker
customer_reviews.text: It's a good simple 3-piece shaker that is nicely insulated. It's always pretty easy to remove the top between drinks (it's solidly 1 drink per use, not large enough for two), and the cover doubles as a useful enough measure.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: best shaker I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional bartender and hate the metal shakers because they tend to get stuff together. This one does get cold or never has gotten stuck together. The plus side is when I forget my jigger it has one inside the cap. Best buy so far
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Makes great mojitos
customer_reviews.text: This shaker's greatest strength is that it's double-walled and plastic, so your hands won't get cold. The cap has 3/4oz, 1oz, 1.5oz markings on it, so you won't need to break out a separate measuring device, and the lid has a strainer built in also. The only downside is that it's not dishwasher safe, so after you've gotten good and drunk off your cocktails, you'll have to hand wash the thing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cocktail shaker serves its purpose pretty well. It does leak occasionally, but just a few dribbles. I didn't realize it wasn't dishwasher safe until after I got it and started reading about it, but that's not a huge inconvenience because it's easy to wash. Next time I'll shell out a little more money to get a better quality shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it for Iced Tea!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to make a Mojito and it works great! But now I actually use the cup for my ice tea and I love it even more. I love that it does not sweat, so when I drink a tall iced tea my hands never get wet from the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Seals very well
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing in a cobbler shaker is that it doesn't leak when you shake it, and this shaker delivers on that promise. While not quite as cool-looking as a Boston shaker when in use, it is the shaker we use the most at home, where the results are more important than the show.
customer_reviews.author: Kisa

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Not the most beautiful shaker, but it works. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a shaker and this one was reasonably priced, it doesn't leak, it has some good basic measurements, and it's not freezing cold when you put cold liquid in it. The only negative is that it's not that nice to look at...but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: starryt29

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your
customer_reviews.text: I only got three uses out of this. As the instruction said I did not put it in the dishwasher but somehow water got in between the outer and inner layer. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Daisydoots

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and does the job just fine for someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and does the job just fine for someone who just wants to mix drinks at home. However, I do have problems getting the top off occasionally so that is a bit annoying. You have to really yank it and it ends up spilling a little.
customer_reviews.author: Adalactane

customer_reviews.title: Workingman's drink shaker
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive shaker doesn't leak -- that's half the battle. It does exactly what its shiny, leaky competitors do, at less cost. Yes, it's made of pedestrian plastic. My Margarita tastes the same, and none of it spilled on to the counter while I made it.
customer_reviews.author: David BurchTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Like the others, I don't find this very elegant, but my hands don't freeze while shaking, the top comes off, it doesn't leak. It does look better than the picture, but still not very stylish. Wish it held more, too (that is probably my biggest complaint!!)
customer_reviews.author: bluebox

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice to have some wiggle room from the measurement line ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything as described, not much detail you can go into here. It measures shots, shakrs drinks, its basically a tervis with a shaker top and strainer. Only complaint is the top measurement is at the top. Would have been nice to have some wiggle room from the measurement line to splilling over the edge, but for the price its a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Surprised !
customer_reviews.text: Have owned cocktail shakers for years. Had low expectations of a plastic one, it is well made, up to Oxo standards. But best of all your hands don't freeze! A great benefit once you have it. Also the tops fit tight, yet can be opened with ease.
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Pando

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea...but
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of the plastic shaker, but the lid is SOOOO hard to get off! I end up spilling liquid all over! It also feels a bit small compared to my normal shaker tin. Good idea, but Ill use my other shaker unless I have a party and need the extra
customer_reviews.author: Doc Ang

customer_reviews.title: ... and mix coffee and it has done both jobs nicely. The construction seems to be solid but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this to shake tea and mix coffee and it has done both jobs nicely. The construction seems to be solid but I the lid is hart to take off sometimes. I also don't like that it's not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: tamagotchibaby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Shaker is great. Stays sealed while shaking, can even be a bit hard to separate the lid after shaking, but I'm not worried about the lid coming off. Love the shot glass measurements in the cap. Nice to not have your hands get cold while shaking!
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but I spot rust
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! My only complaint is I think I can spot some bits of rust on the strainer piece already. Was hoping for better quality than that from OXO.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: It's really difficult to get the top on and off. You have to jiggle it a good bit. However, I do like that it's plastic because it doesn't make as much noise when you shake a drink with ice in it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sharon Younkin's review of OXO Good Grips Plastic Cocktail Shaker
customer_reviews.text: This shaker is not as good as their old plastic shaker. It's difficult to secure the lid. Once you've managed it, it works well and doesn't leak, but if you can't get the lid on, it's basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Younkin

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had ordered this shaker YEARS ago. Works very well, great build, easy to clean and no more cold hands! Most highly recommended to you!
customer_reviews.author: Lak

customer_reviews.title: 5 star shaker
customer_reviews.text: Great shaker. Easy to grip, easy to clean, has a built in strainer and jigger, though I use a separate jigger. Great if in need of a budget shaker, and probably better than most metal ones. Cap has a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever been out and received a martini that has tiny slivers of ice? Not because they were added, but because you could tell the martini was truly shaken cold. I have tried to emulate this with multiple shakers - including very expensive ones. This simple shaker did the trick. While shaking, your hands do not get cold. You are also able to aggressively shake and produce a very cold drink with the small ice slivers. Very impressive - I bought the other OXO shaker and while it had its benefits, this shaker provides what many more expensive alternatives do not provide. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice plastic shaker
customer_reviews.text: This cocktail shaker is dishwasher safe and easy to take apart. I've had metal ones before and after a while they became harder to open, not this one. Works great, and looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: Better than metal
customer_reviews.text: (+)'s -Insulated feature makes drink extra cold quickly -top comes of easily after shaking and is easy to rinse (-)'s not dish washer safe only large enough for one drink if filled with ice
customer_reviews.author: Robert Merivel

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but it works.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason cocktail shakers are expensive. This is literally a plastic cup with a lid and strainer. It's not fancy but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Token

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It's easy to use and doesn't get my hands cold when shaking up a drink. Built in strainer and measuring cap is a plus and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rith

customer_reviews.title: Won't freeze your hands off but careful with the plastic inside.
customer_reviews.text: Great shaker that's well-built. Like other reviewers have said, the outside of the shaker doesn't get too cold when shaking a drink with ice. Just be careful with muddling any grainy cocktail ingredients like sugar in this thing. I must have muddled it too hard the first time and ended up scratching the plastic on the bottom of this shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cap

customer_reviews.title: It's five pm somewhere!
customer_reviews.text: This shaker is awesome! It keeps my martinis from melting while shaking and come out with ice chips on top. I have bought several for friends and they love it too. My pretty one is for decoration now.
customer_reviews.author: Texmexaholic

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak and doesn't transfer the cold to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not leak and doesn't transfer the cold to the outside when shaking. It does take concentration to put the lid on, it is a tight fit, thus no leaking
customer_reviews.author: McKie Jr

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: really like how this snaps on and you can really give the cocktail a nice little shake without getting it everywhere. easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaker So Far
customer_reviews.text: It shakes. It measures. It does not leak. The insulation is also nice. Not the table top, presentation shaker of my dreams, but since martinis are a daily occurrence, it is now my go-to device.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shaker that does not frustrate!
customer_reviews.text: I have about 6 cocktail shakers and they all make me crazy. Shake Shake and then the top is stuck and it is just frustrating. Not a problem with this shaker. Works great. Cleans up great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: ice breaks it
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the inner plastic cracked after 30 or so uses. The liquid got stuck between the inner and outer plastic so it has to be discarded as unsanitary. It's probably not realistic to expect this type of plastic to stand up to the force of ice striking it during shaking. Other kinds of plastic by a different manufacturer might have the strength needed but I'll go back to metal and glass for now. These materials handle the ice impact and temperature change well.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It works well without leaking. The plastic design keeps it from sweating like many metal shakers. I just use it for making non-alcoholic chocolatinis. Good quality for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eddlemon

customer_reviews.title: great shaker
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality even for the price. I wish it were clear but love that it's insulated so I can shake until Christmas if I'd like to
customer_reviews.author: nate357159

customer_reviews.title: Shaken, not stirred
customer_reviews.text: Not as flashy as a stainless shaker but does a good job. The top's a bit snug but that's preferable to having gaps. Good is good and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: JRausta

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: be careful when mixing drinks. mine kept spilling from the lid but if you hold it down and together its easier to pour into shots or glasses
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Leaks with a lid thats difficult to pry off
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this shaker. It leaks terribly and the lid is extremely difficult to get off when emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Sharief Zahra

customer_reviews.title: Good shaker
customer_reviews.text: Great, but sometimes the top is hard to take off.
customer_reviews.author: emg55

customer_reviews.title: was told numerous times how great it works
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, was told numerous times how great it works. The rubberized coating makes it nonslip.
customer_reviews.author: Stanton

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shaker - it does not leak
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaker - it does not leak, great for our vacation home where we mix drinks outside since it is insulated.
customer_reviews.author: VegGirl

customer_reviews.title: We love this shaker
customer_reviews.text: We love this shaker. Good size and much easier to manage and get open than a metal shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT LEAK!!! I ordered this and had at my door in less then 24 hours. Ur hands stay warm and it doesn't leak most importantly, and ur hands stay dry! Best shot shaker I've ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Adam Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to have one of these. They are a must have for margaritas!!!! Very light and durable, easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.author: Perry H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good - Measuring lines are helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Generally, this is a good shaker. It seals well and I like the measuring lines inside the top. Only drawback is that it is a little hard to open for someone with small hands.
customer_reviews.author: jenslc

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and easy to clean. fun little drink mixer that's not too expensive. it was a fun little christmas present for my husband :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: so much easier to use than the standard metal ones, it's perfect and the jigger is included so it makes it super convenient
customer_reviews.author: Tanya K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is exaclty what i wanted. cheap, looks pretty sleek for plastic, keep your hands from getting cold and wet like metal ones, even makes the shaking quieter. the lid comes off nice and easy but have not had one spill!(although i always keep a finger on the lid no matter what kind of shaker i use)the lid is marked with 3/4, 1, 1&1/2 oz markers making it easy to mix up drinks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: fofo

customer_reviews.title: Mostly very good...
customer_reviews.text: Only gripe is the main lid is unbelievably hard to get off. Otherwise, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shaker we've had. doesn't leak! great purchase! highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaker (top is easier to get off than you think!)
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shaker. Some complained about how tight the lid can get, but if you just take off the shot/measuring top then put your thumb through the top and pull---it'll come off easy! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little small but good for the price. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: ✨

customer_reviews.title: mix mix mix
customer_reviews.text: This works just like it should, just remember to wash after so it won't be hard to clean later on.
customer_reviews.author: B_Oblivion

customer_reviews.title: awesome alternative to metal shaker!
customer_reviews.text: had this for three years now and use it often- still holding up very well. Very nice alternative to freezing your hands off and not being able to open the top of a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Williams

customer_reviews.title: no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: purchased to dissolve powdered drinks and absolutely love no leaking!! The drink mixes for water bottles are too strong in just a glass of water - this allows me to mix properly and dilute as needed and then pour easily....great solution
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed to make a good Gin martini.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL G. DULANEY

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This shaker works great and has never leaked. I wash it in the dishwasher, which I think you're not supposed to do. The markings inside the top are wearing off I think as a result, but since I rarely use it for measuring it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic product. As a beginner in the area of drink mixing this was a great choice for a shaker. The size is perfect and the look is awesome. The nonslip jigger with measurement lines is a great benefit for me until I get proportions down. I am extremely happy with this purchase and can't wait to continue mixing drinks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boback

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for the price! It does the job anyway. I've made good cocktails from this. Easy to wash too. Would spill a little bit but I guess these things are already my fault. It doesn't hold much drink too. But all in all I liked it especially how it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: OXO Good grips plastic coctail shaker works great
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the OXO Plastic cocktail shaker. Its easy to use and clean up. Unlike the metal ones this one is easier to get the top off.
customer_reviews.author: bsevy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this cocktail shaker. Having the built-in measuring cup is awesome. All my friends loved it at our last martini night and will buying one themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Alleman

customer_reviews.title: but they like using it better than the old shaker
customer_reviews.text: Our barteders were tired of fighting with our old metal shaker that always got stuck together. This shaker not only solved that problem, but they like using it better than the old shaker, too.
customer_reviews.author: Janesville Community Center Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Although I personally prefer a mental shaker because it looks cooler, I ordered this one because it was cheap. And honestly, it is worth every buck I paid. I especially like the cap with measures. Just one thing: as a lot of other people said, it is HAND-WASH ONLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: WiLd FoX

customer_reviews.title: Worst Cocktail Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. After you wash it the kid gets stuck and takes forever just to put on or take off. Wish I had purchased something way better.
customer_reviews.author: Bwitty42

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Whats to say? It does what it does. For someone like me who just wants to mix cocktails and drinks correctly this gets it done nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chuki

customer_reviews.title: Cocktail Shaker with frills, no spills!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a month so far and have used it maybe a half-dozen times. I have yet to spill, leak, or otherwise mess the drink in any way so far. Other shakers have leaked or spilled some even with minor use, so I am impressed with the results so far. And considering the price (and the fact the shaker is essentially insulated), it is well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: to an easy clean, this does the job well
customer_reviews.text: From measuring, shaking, pouring, to an easy clean, this does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Conyers

customer_reviews.title: Unusable over time
customer_reviews.text: The top gets warped over time which makes it unusable as a shaker. This could be the result of washing in a dishwasher, so beware if you choose to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Milas

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good shaker that would not get too cold. This fit the need and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: NKromberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product, like all Oxo products I have ever purchased, is sturdy and easy to use. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far. The measuring cup-top works very well, and once you put it together everything stays together. I did try and mix something with club soda, without thinking, and the thing blew up. That was my fault.
customer_reviews.author: John Archer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I might order more to hand out as CHRISTMAS gifts....
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shaker
customer_reviews.text: The perfect shaker at the right price and very easy to grip without your hand getting cold. Very easy to use and top come with measurements on it
customer_reviews.author: cedric marks

customer_reviews.title: Best shaker I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Gets drinks very cold fast and the outside stays warm and dry so you don't freeze your hands while shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this shaker for my husband who loves it for making margaritas. He says it feels solid and durable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kinzel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must buy for those who have sweaty hands !!!
customer_reviews.author: Komal Mendhekar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome shaker. It doesn't leak and it doesn't freeze your hands either. I just wish it were a little bigger, but other than that, GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: BeeH

customer_reviews.title: Ok shaker
customer_reviews.text: This shaker is ok. On the plus side, it has a measuring cup on the lid which is useful. It also won't get cold because its not metal. On the negative, the plastic top can be difficult to get off at times. Also, hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than what I thought, and YES... ITS HARD TO OPEN THE MAIN LID.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon SDA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to clean shaker. Seems pretty durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Reality

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but....
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to use this to replace a blender when mixing powder/drink mixtures. (Trying to avoid the dis-assembly and cleaning of the mixer.)The item works fine as a shaker if you're mixing liquids, but trying to dissolve a powder in a liquid is quite another story. I also find that the top does not remove easily without a struggle - perhaps it is the newness of the item which will improve with further use. Bottom line, stick to mixing liquids only!
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected  from OXO
customer_reviews.text: This product was hard to put lids on and off and I expected it to be user friendly with my arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Jamvold

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feel and look
customer_reviews.text: Product looks and feels cheap. after one hand wash, the cap molded and now does not fit into the base. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: james gallagher

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Plastic Shaker
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1| Size:Set of 1Shake, mix and pour with the Oxo good grips cocktail shaker with jigger cap and built-in strainer. Double wall construction prevents sweating and keeps the cold away from hands during use. A soft gripping surface on the jigger adds comfort while pouring and prevents hands from slipping while shaking. .75-ounce, 1-ounce and 1.5-ounce measurement markings are located on the inner surface of the jigger for easy liquid measuring. Simply pour in favorite ingredients and shake in style.
feature_bullets: 16-ounce cocktail shaker with jigger cap and built-in strainer
Double wall construction insulates beverages to keep them cool and prevents sweating
Soft, non-slip grip for confident shaking
Measures 3-1/2 inches in diameter and 9 inches tall

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars339 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
